channel.title: shiny on Daddy's data analysis by Kazu Nozue
channel.description: Recent content in shiny on Daddy's data analysis by Kazu Nozue

item.title: How to run shiny app in a blog
item.description: Shiny is an interactive application written in R using Shiny package. A Shiny app can be run on local RStudio or on server. If a Shyny app’s URL is available, you can embed the URL into <iframe></iframe> (a HTML tag). An output is html by following instruction. Also this blog is made by markdown and posted by blogdown R package that uses Hugo language for static website framework. Instruction step1.
